# is-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                                        | Type                                                                                   | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `color`    | `color`    | The color to use, default is `default`                                             | `"default" \| "error" \| "info" \| "primary" \| "secondary" \| "success" \| "warning"` | `'default'` |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | If `true`, then user cannot interact with the button and changed color             | `boolean`                                                                              | `false`     |
| `display`  | `display`  | Display of the button                                                              | `"fullwidth"`                                                                          | `undefined` |
| `href`     | `href`     | Contains a URL If prop is set, an anchor tag will be rendered                      | `string`                                                                               | `undefined` |
| `shape`    | `shape`    | Shape of the button                                                                | `"round"`                                                                              | `undefined` |
| `size`     | `size`     | Size of the button, default set normal                                             | `"large" \| "medium" \| "small"`                                                       | `undefined` |
| `target`   | `target`   | Where to display linked url apply when `href` props provided clue: `_blank, _self` | `string`                                                                               | `undefined` |
| `type`     | `type`     | Type of the button                                                                 | `"button" \| "reset" \| "submit"`                                                      | `'button'`  |
